lenders.name: Nova en Viggo
lenders.loan_because: It's the perfect way to support people all over the world, learn my children they should be thankfull for what we have and also teach them that giving is a good thing!

lenders.name: Johan

lenders.occupational_info:
I am a christian and beside my job as a maintenance technician, I study at:
King's Evangelical Divinity School
Theology and Religious Studies
University of Wales
Lampeter
(United Kingdom) and hope to earn my bachelor's degree in theology within 3 years.

lenders.name: mustafa
lenders.loan_because: Ja kan beter mensen iets lenen zodat ze op eigen benen kunnen staan dan elke keer wat geven.
lenders.occupational_info: ondernemer

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed and improve their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of .net developers and designers.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky to be born in a rich country. Sharing this luck with people across the world is a pleasure.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use their computers in a way that is honest and efficient.

lenders.name: Ethan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people.

lenders.name: Jaret
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit as well as supporting those who are trying to better themselves.

lenders.name: Khadija_Muslima
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Gi.von
lenders.loan_because: kiva offre à ceux d'entre nous qui le peuvent , une façon de venir en aide aux moins fortunés tout en leur permettant de sauvegarder leur dignité . Bravo .

lenders.name: katja
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world. Kiva makes it easy and fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big hospital. I make general x-rays of lungs and bones. My specialisation is CT-scan: use x-rays to make digital "slices" of someone.

lenders.name: Mayla
lenders.occupation: student to become a primaryschool teacher

lenders.name: Randa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-credits
lenders.occupational_info: easy yet life-changing

lenders.name: Antoinette
lenders.loan_because: I recently (2005) started as an entrepreneur myself, in the translation field. I really enjoy my work and would like to support others to start and maintain their own businesses as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional English to Dutch translator, specializing in medicine (general, pharmaceuticals), health care, psychology, wildlife conservation, etc.

lenders.name: Griffin
lenders.loan_because: This account is being given to Griffin. It was originally a holiday gift to his grandmother from her daughter (Griffin's Mom) ... to prevent cycles such as poverty from haunting each subsequent generation. To make a positive difference in the world through the gift of self-sufficiency and to demonstrate what she always taught us was the "Spirit of Christmas" for people of all religions. Now, Griffin helps choose people based  on his own interests and what he thinks people should have access to.
lenders.occupational_info: As a former social worker and school volunteer, and after-school- care worker, my mother has helped improve the lives of many children. My son, Griffin, is an outgoing child who is full of love. He is 8 years old and in the fourth grade at Texas Virtual Academy.

lenders.name: Harm Jan
lenders.loan_because: Want to help people in need
lenders.occupational_info: I work on ships as an officer

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because:
Je crois à la force du pret par rapport au don quand les circonstances le permettent. Il est important que les personnes soient impliquées et motivées. C'est une des clefs du succès et du développement.
I believe in the strength of loan vs donation/gift under specific circumstances. Il is important  to be involved and motivated. This one of the sucess key for development.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an independant consultant for various organisations in France. I help these organisations to develop communication (between people), team building, efficiency through involvement & motivation.

lenders.name: Michael and Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed with having the money to do things to better our lives, and we'd simply like to pass that on to others, so that they may thrive and share that same happiness in their lives.

lenders.name: emmy
lenders.loan_because: I was in Africa with my sister, she adopted two children. We have seen so much poverty, now I can help a little bit to.
lenders.occupational_info: Housewife and mother from 3 daughters

lenders.name: Sander
lenders.loan_because: Its a great way to help someone! They learn the need to be independend and be sucesful.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a mayor airline and have my own marketing company.

lenders.name: Tad
lenders.loan_because: This is one way I can make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Quality Engineer at a National Laboratory where pure science and research is conducted. This is where the future is invented.

lenders.name: Karisse
lenders.loan_because:
This idea of micro-lending has the potential to improve our world and can give efficent support to people in developing countries.
It connects people with ideas and dreams with sources of finance from across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info:
We make a living by what we do, but we make a life by what we give.
-Winston Churchill

lenders.name: The Erbers
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be in a position to help others, and we remember when there was a time when we couldn't and needed help ourselves.

lenders.name: Tania
lenders.loan_because: I believe that I can be the change I want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional fundraising consultant.  I work with charities to help them be more effective in raising money to make change within their communitties.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lenders.name: sharon
lenders.loan_because: Earth's future can be abundant with peace, love and happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a transportation engineer.

lenders.name: C
lenders.loan_because: It´s a very interesting way to help needed people. I´m very happy to help who only needs an opportunity...

lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a chance to make a better life for them and family.
lenders.occupational_info: Three kids is hard work. Ask any mom.

lenders.name: Simone
lenders.loan_because: Anyone who works hard should have the chance to succeed. I especially want to help mothers.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: My brother gave me this as a birthday present, I am glad he did!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with homless women with children facing the crisis of homelessness.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: It's a global village.  I like to help people when I have the means to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make books ready for publication.

lenders.name: Pi och Patrik
lenders.loan_because: We got an account here as a wedding-gift and it feels really good because it continues and we can help others get better lives hopefully
lenders.occupational_info: I work with kids in the ages between 10-16, my subjects are history, geography, social science and religion.

lenders.name: Tremayne Tatem
lenders.loan_because: Each One, Reach One.
lenders.occupational_info: I empower people to create wealth.

lenders.name: Morten
lenders.loan_because: Microlending has the potential to improve our world, helping people to take a step out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Thanks to Kiva for giving people around the world the possibility to help!

lenders.name: Maryanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that individuals can make a big difference through simple actions motivated by love.

lenders.name: Dion & Sabine
lenders.loan_because: We care...!

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: It encourages people to make an effort and I can target my donation to a person with a face and a history.
lenders.occupational_info: I am vicepresident in a large insurance company, managing 65 people in my department. I am responsible for the systems supporting sales and administration for the Mass Market.

lenders.name: Natasha
lenders.loan_because: the Kiva concept is amazing! It is so  important to make others financially independent. You encourage their self-worth by allowing them to earn a living, and you help to create a sustainable future for others.  They learn skills and secure a small business that will continue to feed their families, not only on a one-time basis, which is what tends to happen with most charitable gifts. Kiva encourages independence, but at the same time letting an aspiring entrepreneur in another country know they're not alone.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the insurance field.

lenders.name: Jolanda
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives me the opportunity to give individual people worldwide a loan to support their business.

lenders.name: Bakatiloma
lenders.loan_because: The least I can do is share some of my 'fortune' with others.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe that grassroots local action is the best option for sustainable development.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate from Trent University, in Ontario, Canada. I studied politics, and specifically globalization and sustainable development.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: To lend a hand....

lenders.name: Kirsten
lenders.loan_because: I think this idea could change the world, it is like the butterfly effect to me.  I think we all have a responsibilty to give something to this cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I love staying home during the week with my son, and I bartend on the weekends.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to support small businesses around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on migration and refugee issues.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I believe that "chances given" are as  important as "chances received".
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in finding homes for their families.

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: I would rather invest in the future of my fellow citizens of the world than spend $25 on anything else.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great and direct way of helping people take charge of their own future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people and computers, in government and banks, in The Netherlands and sometimes abroad, for example in Bolivia and India.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because:
It is important to work together with my kids to show them how we can make small changes in order to make the world a better place.  We have traveled in SE Asia and were especially touched in Cambodia...we walked away feeling kicked in the head by a huge dose of reality.  We can't be there to help at this very moment, so we can at least do a little bit as we are able, here.  

Shawn is my 18yo stepson who is very socially conscious and who actually asked for a kiva donation for his Christmas gift.  It was a good way to start us off.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have many roles in our family.  I support my husband while he runs his business, I run my own small crafting business...selling my products in stores and at markets. My most important job is teaching my children. 

Shawn is a grade 12 student who has just been accepted to University in the engineering department.  He has always been globally conscious, but as an almost adult, he recognizes our place of privilege and feels a need to help.  

As a family we enjoy playing, deep discussions around the dinner table, camping and traveling.

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: we gotta help each other if we can .
lenders.occupational_info: heavy

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: there is nothing more fulfilling than seeing these wonderful people build a better life for themselves. To whom much is given much is expected.

lenders.name: Chip L
lenders.loan_because: It makes the world smaller.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur and serial networker connecting the world one person at a time.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: This is my way of helping other people around the world who have a dream of changing their lives and the lives of their families for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a happy housewife who loves to lend a hand!  My husband, who is from India, loves the whole concept of Kiva and hopes to see micro loans available to people back home in southern India :D

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that business can do amazing things.
lenders.occupational_info: Read, Research, Write, Repeat

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Stay-at-home father.

lenders.name: Cisca en Rob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to make their own business so they can earn their own money.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to learn how they can use their money on a responsable way.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: This makes people's lives better.

lenders.name: SueB
lenders.loan_because: It drives home that I can make a fundamental difference at the grassroots - one loan at a time...
lenders.occupational_info: I like lending to single women with children; those looking to buy tools/equipment for their trade;  ventures which could have a domino effect , for example, by sustaining employees or generating benefits for other local businesses depending on it (example, transportation).

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: It's my small way to give back to our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make movies

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist that creates designs for businesses to represent themselves in a professional and stylish way to help them become noticed by their customers.

lenders.name: Rune
lenders.loan_because: Through this place, it is possible to help specific projects that will make a big difference for many people.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to put my money behind my belief that the only way for people to better their lives is to have a fighting chance to invest in themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a lawyer who works to interpret the US pension system, to protect both pensioners and the entities that pay them.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I want the blessings God has poured out in my life to be free-flowing to others...

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I think it might make a difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children learn to read and to do math.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: because it makes me feel good and isn't that grand ;-)
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young adults.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because:
It makes me glad inside. That's all. 
My only regret is not being able to meet some of these people in person. Best of wishes for you all.
lenders.occupational_info: I move freight from one part of North America to another. I leave home for three weeks at a time, then take one week off. I own my own truck (Yes, that's it  in the photo) and work in co-operation with a freight forwarding company. In my spare time I am fixing up an antique fishing boat. I am married and live in Canada, on Vancouver Island.

lenders.name: UBCO
lenders.occupation: We are students training to become teachers.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: To help people

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: It is the least I can do!!  For almost nothing, I am helping someone achieve a goal that will impact their life.  Imagine if everyone who is capable did the same!!

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.occupational_info: Owner of a Automotive repair shop

lenders.name: Nathan & Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach French to kids who have a hard time at school.
She helps people raise money.

lenders.name: Julia and Santi
lenders.loan_because: It is the least we can do.
lenders.occupational_info: Julia does all sorts of the background work to help the company I work for function on a daily basis.  Santi does everything.

lenders.name: Langfield Family
lenders.loan_because: This loan was a gift to all the adults in our family from one of our sons and his family for Christmas instead of buying gifts. They knew that we would all appeciate the gift of giving to a farming family in need. We plan to keep re-lending the money to others in need as it is re-paid.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a family farming business that revolves primarily around the poultry egg industry. We started as a small family farm with poultry and broad acre crops and have expanded this to be able to support us and our three sons and their young families. Our three sons run the business and although now retired we are still very actively involved with them in managing the business.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to improve their lives.  If I can help in even a small way, we both benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: I examine eyes to determine if eyeglasses or contact lenses are needed to improve vision.  I use eye medications in cases of infections and treat eye injuries.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this thing together.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is essential to keeping our world economy sound, and everyone deserves a chance at personal success.

lenders.name: tim
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans help small business owners with a hand up to create a sustained business for the long term
lenders.occupational_info: I run several cafes and have been self employed for many years, initally i also took out a loan to get started, paying that back and have gone on to employ many people since.

lenders.name: Erin, Heath, and Jesse
lenders.loan_because: We actually just started but we think it's a swell idea. Hoping the receipients of our loans will profit from them and raise their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: Heath is a professor of electrical engineering and I teach writing to new college students. Jesse is 10 but hopes to drive a bulldozer professionally when he gets older.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: "But for the grace of God there go I..."

lenders.name: YMCI
lenders.occupational_info:
Youth Microcredit International YMCI” is a student run organization looking to make a difference by loaning small amounts of money to businesses wanting to develop and grow.

High school students are starting clubs in their schools to spread awareness and raise money to invest in microfinance. Currently, YMCI is helping Guatemalan microentrepreneurs by providing them with Internet training, and selling their handicrafts to the international market.

lenders.name: David & Olivia
lenders.loan_because: it empowers people and is a sustainable long-term solution.

lenders.name: Tim Wood
lenders.loan_because: I have brothers and sisters in need
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying international business at Colorado State University (www.csugsse.com)

lenders.name: patricia
lenders.loan_because: ...do unto others..........

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: I support women entreprenuers.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business succeed

lenders.name: George,Laura,Zach & Gill
lenders.loan_because: we know that these few dollars can make a much bigger difference to some of these people than it will to us.  We've seen poverty both at home and abroad.  If our few dollars help make that  difference in the lives of others, we'll be far wealthier than we are today!

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to empower someone else with a small amount of money.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a foundation that helps people around the world have better access to health services, clean water, and education.

lenders.name: erica
lenders.loan_because: I respect the entrepreneurial spirit!

lenders.name: Regis
lenders.loan_because: We feel an obligation towards those who have ambition and do not have the opportunity to act on that ambition.  A substantial amount of success can be obtained by even a small amount of committment
lenders.occupational_info: Being Economics Majors, the three of us have to take into account international lending practices.  In addition to this however, a Jesuit education emphasizes the implications of moral standards.  The basis behind the introduction of microlending practices was to highlight the fact that even simple entrepreneurial ventures need some sort of funding.

lenders.name: roy and cheryl
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Interpetor of history and nature

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I want to give those who are less fortunate an opportunity to better their lives.

lenders.name: Keizo Takahashi
lenders.loan_because:
A good turn deserves another.

It means that "Nasake wa hito no tame narazu" in Japanese.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am planing to build my own business for recyclable energy services to those who met Tohoku earthquake in Japan..
In addtion
I should help someone who needs loan.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: The development of the petit bourgeois is generally a precondition for effective infrastructure development when state direction is corrupt or incompetent and market relations are dysfunctional.
lenders.occupational_info: I play poker for money in casinos and on the internet.

lenders.name: Barbara and Marc
lenders.loan_because: I can. I loan because as Martin Luther King Jr said: "Anybody can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and your verb agree to serve. You don't have to know about Plato and Aristotle to serve...You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love. Every man must decide whether he will walk in the light of creative altruism or in the darkness of destructive selfishness. This is the judgment. Life's most persistent and urgent question is," What are you going to do for others?"
lenders.occupational_info: I help children become better learners, better citizens and better people. They, in turn, help me do the same.

lenders.name: Yuri
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to know that a small contribution can make a big difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I have a great passion for ideas that help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with businesses to help them communicate to others what they sell.

lenders.name: miriam
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: ICT

lenders.name: Eirik
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help people achieve their goals and bring them one step closer to success.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I believe that these loans help to make the world better.  Charity, as valuable and necessary  as it is, only seem to try to keep the world from getting worse.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a computer to prepare shop documents for a company that builds cabinets for peoples' homes.

lenders.name: Arie
lenders.loan_because: it is a very simple and reliable methode to directly support somebody who may need the money badly!
lenders.occupational_info: i am retired, thanks to God.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help others, and hopefully to reduce the birth rate.

lenders.name: Audun
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Software engineer

lenders.name: Kelteren
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this implementation of modern technology will be much more efficient and effective than traditional aid. If people in third-world countries want to become self-sustained, they need to learn how to plan for themselves properly instead of just reaching out a hand and receive from the big aid-organisations.

lenders.name: Haavard
lenders.loan_because: If I can help someone to make themselves a better future, it must be the best investment I can make.

lenders.name: Kristie
lenders.loan_because: these loans are empowering to the people who receive them, which makes me feel as if I am doing more good than simply giving someone charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on an internet store for my company. I make sure the items are all listed properly, have the right pictures, and the right prices.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people succeed in business and fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the semiconductor industry.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: Money is the best lubricant for making dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I sail my catamaran around the Caribbean sea championing worthy causes.

lenders.name: André
lenders.loan_because: In my occupation everything involves around making money. I want to help other people in the world who really need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a casino in Nijmegen/Holland. I am all-round, that means that I deal cards at the Black Jack, Baccarat and Poker. I am also an American Roulette-dealer. When a new dealer is hired I am his/her teacher.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Kind friends gave $100 on my behalf as a wedding anniversary gift.

lenders.name: Arietha
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important for women all over the world to be independent and to be proud of what they do. Here on KiVA you choose a borrower, make a loan, get repaid and then - if you wish - you relend again... that way you can make a BIG difference to those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.occupational_info: Commercial Photography

lenders.name: Slawomir
lenders.loan_because: it's a cool thing to do!

lenders.name: Oskar
lenders.loan_because: I want to help independent people which are working hard to establish their own business.

lenders.name: Steve & Thersa
lenders.loan_because: The journey through life is easier when the burdens are shared.

lenders.name: ROBERT
lenders.loan_because: I have been involved in the arts for over sixty years.  I believe the arts to be a gift-society and artistic abilities are about giving.  The arts have been extremely good to me, and I feel it is time to share in other ways.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an actor-director, writer, conceptual, visual-sculptural artist.  I am presently the Artistic and Managing Director of a theatre and dance company, and I have just celebrated my 30th anniversary in that position.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: a little goes a long way

lenders.name: Allan
lenders.loan_because: it is fun to do  ;0)
lenders.occupational_info:
Custom hand made silver jewellery..
retired

lenders.name: Boeringer
lenders.loan_because: Je pense que c'est une bonne chose de financer des projets à taux zéros car les banques pratique des taux qui s'apparentent à du vol et ne prêtent qu'à ceux qui sont déjà riche (I think that it is a good thing to finance projects atrate zeros because the banks practical of the rates which are connected with steal and lend only to those which are already rich)

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: To help others.

lenders.name: Per Lönn
lenders.loan_because: I want to support others to find a way out of poverty.

lenders.name: Earl
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the best ways for ordinary people to get access to capital. Usurious money lenders and banks hold back the world's economic development by only loaning to collatoralized lenders or charging rates far in excess of the market.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students the value of understanding the world around them through economics.

lenders.name: Stephen Morse
lenders.loan_because: My third grade class was studying economics and wanted to learn about investing.  So we collected money and I matched their total to loan to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an elementary school teacher in Arlington Virginia.  I have a class of 17 students.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out in whatever way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I finished my term of compulsory service in the army, and am currently taking a break. I will be teaching students in my alma mater next year before I start university.

lenders.name: Torbjørn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to make theire own business.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great program and there's very little risk for a great benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: Web developer at the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST).

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.occupation: Development Assistant at a Civil Rights NFP
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women.  I know that if you give women the tools to make their lives and their families life better, they will put them to good use.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: "I am a citizen of the World." We must support people in need throughout the world, in order to create prosperity, joy and peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach World History in an urban high school.

lenders.name: Sibylle
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I put patients or parts of their body to sleep, so that they can be operated on safely and comfortably. Most wake up afterwards :-)

lenders.name: Gonnie
lenders.loan_because: I care and this is a good way to help others

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: Dawn and Mel
lenders.loan_because: We want people to be able to realize their dreams and fulfill their lives.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: We live to give, I can change someones  world by improving their  financial status. I enjoy making a difference in a person's life. I am challenged by God's word that says, "Whoever has the worlds goods and sees his brother in need yet closes his heart against him how can God's love abide in him."
lenders.occupational_info: I have a lawnservice and landscape business. I mow and fertilize lawns,  maintain flower beds, trim shrubs and trees. I create and maintain attractivel andscapes. I also administrate and live in The Good Samaritan's mens facility with ten men who are recovering from drug and alcohol addiction.

lenders.name: Peak Performance Ptnrs
lenders.loan_because: I believe in shared fate, and the cycle of giving and receiving. When we help our brothers and sisters we help humanity, therefore ourselves. United and through a shared vision of our future, there is no challenge that cannot be solved.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve the purpose of helping others find and express their own highest purpose in life.

lenders.name: Amy & Janiece
lenders.loan_because: We don't need more STUFF. So instead of giving gifts for holidays and birthdays, we give loans to the LADIEZ.

lenders.name: Kieren
lenders.loan_because: I do what I can to empower women to have better lives.

lenders.name: Mike & Becky
lenders.loan_because: it's an investment in hope.
lenders.occupational_info: Public library. Husband is retired.

lenders.name: Brit
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people.

lenders.name: Ylva
lenders.loan_because: I think that perhaps I can give help to self-help...Entrepreneurs are the ones to lead the small society to growing....
lenders.occupational_info: I am a newly retired female who have had a very good life and been travelling a lot around the world.I do not believe in charity but in help-to-self-help..or self-doing...

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
I have being given a lot of opportunities in my life to improve myself. I want that someone else has an opportunity as well.
I like the idea of helping people to become independent.
I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: After getting my MBA I moved here in Palo Alto.. I love the Silicon Valley. After working for Google and Stanford, I am working on a start up that focus on improving education in US helping teachers to become better teachers

lenders.name: Annette
lenders.loan_because: It is good to feel others believe in you and to get a chance to prove what you are able to. Once as a student, I was helped. Now I want to help other people to make their plans come true.
lenders.occupational_info: Private practitioner

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: Why not try to make a little difference?

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: i saw this on the oprah show. i come from holland and in december we have 2 major holidays. 5 dec. sinterklaas, and 25/26 christmas.   all you see on tv is spend spend spend, eat eat eat!  makes me sick!! if i can make these ladies live life a little bit better, by me skipping to buy eyecontacts for 1 month, i think thats the way to go!
lenders.occupational_info: i sow sunscreens/sunshields. the kind you put on your wall outside.. you know.. like bakories or restaurants have! - thats why i chose this lady to loan to, she is also in textiles! :D

lenders.name: Hrishikesh
lenders.occupation: Sr Product Marketing @ Smart Modular Technology
lenders.loan_because: I believe lending more effective than just donating money. I focus on people who also believe in educating their children.
lenders.occupational_info: Just a professional with good heart and willingness to do my tiny bit of good for the world.

lenders.name: Microfest
lenders.occupation: Organized a mini beer-festival for microloans

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I don't believe in charity, I believe in people's ability to support themselves, given the chance.
lenders.occupational_info:
I travel a lot. It's what I like to do best. In normal life I design roads. 

*** I'm not interested in joining lender groups! I receive a lot of, sometimes random, invitations so I stopped responding to them. Not that I want to be rude, apologies in advance!

lenders.name: Globe
lenders.loan_because: I've seen incredible poverty all over the world first hand.  It's unsettling to me to realize how the circumstances of geography or politics can prevent wonderful people from reaching their dreams.  In my profession, I've delivered aid after all sorts of natural disasters.  Although that aid is critical to people's survival, it's often just a temporary fix.  I joined the military to help people, and I believe that I have, but Kiva gives me the opportunity to help them in a more enduring way.
lenders.occupational_info: I transfer cargo worldwide for the US Military as a pilot.  I have been involved in typhoon, earthquake, and refugee (war and famine induced) related relief missions.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering women around the world to be leaders.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students to participate in social action for world change.  I also train other teachers to do the same.

lenders.name: JPt
lenders.loan_because: i'm lucky enough to be able to...

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I believe in the karmic concept that to give is to receive. It makes me feel good!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the most amazing gift...Tommy Emmanuel, an Australian guitar virtuoso. He travels all over the world, performing and generating love and good will through his muse...music!

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people out!
lenders.occupational_info: I do breast cancer research.

lenders.name: Amit
lenders.loan_because: I hope to improve the lives of people who contribute so much to this world and get very little in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students to become pharmacists (chemists)

lenders.name: mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help  make a difference in this world and this is one small way
lenders.occupational_info: I examine sick children,healthy children and  talk to their parents and diagnose and  treat their illnesses as well as teach them healthy  ways of life.  I also teach student nurses who are studying pediatrics

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I think it is everyone's duty to share what they can and because it gives me pleasure to help someone who may not have access to the support that I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop, design, write communications and promo material for artists and cultural organizations :  websites, album covers, posters and more. I am also a performing musician and help run a provincial folk music organization (that I founded) in Québec, Canada.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to contribute a small amount to the finance that business in the developing world so desperately need.
lenders.occupational_info: I research private philanthropy to the developing world.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic means to help people around the world persue their dreams and make something happen!
lenders.occupational_info: Difficult but rewarding.

lenders.name: cobie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can. Besides I own a sewing machine shop. Because of that I was able to provide some people in Kitale, Kenya with sewing machines. I love it!
lenders.occupational_info: selling sewing machines

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel connected to the globe.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: it's loving.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a college student studying Health Promotion and Spanish.

lenders.name: dana
lenders.loan_because: this is an novel way to help and an incredible organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about non-profits, community features, arts and spirituality for newspapers, blogs and magazines.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.occupation: Sales & Marketing Manager at Harvard University
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: Hmm because it remembers me of my parents, when they took me to the poorest of the poor in north africa when I was a little child. I still remember how friendly those people were. They do not expect something but give the best and last to a european family without any asking. They shared their meals with us. Would we do the same?
lenders.occupational_info: Science TV Programs for the german speaking market. Just like Discovery Chanel or National Geographic but with a lower budget. I will move to asia in August 2008 and travel southeast asia for half a year.

lenders.name: Yee-Wah
lenders.loan_because: I believe that ordinary people working together can accomplish great things. "No man is a failure who has friends" (from movie "It's a Wonderful Life")
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate business opportunities and risks for a large information technology company with 10,000 employees.

lenders.name: Diving Dolphins
lenders.loan_because: Friends help friends
lenders.occupational_info: The Diving Dolphins is a group of daughters and Dads in Silicon Valley that get together to have fun, learn about nature and learn to be good citizens of the world.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: To share my blessings with others

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: self-sufficiency and successful loans are gifts that keep on giving.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Joy filled experience
lenders.occupational_info: new goal:  professional volunteer!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I very much appreciate the help my family has given me to become self sufficient and provide for myself; I am very fortunate. It feels only right to share that goodwill and support with others who are trying to make it in this world. My sincerest best wishes to all those receiving these funds as well as to those who are loaning the funds.
lenders.occupational_info: I do evaluations of school based prevention programs to see if they are working. The types of programs include teen pregnancy and STD/HIV prevention, tobacco and drug use prevention, chronic disease prevention through the promotion of nutrition and fitness.

lenders.name: Manja
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's fun ;-)

lenders.occupational_info: I sell exercise equipment

lenders.name: Ashley

lenders.name: Mark

lenders.name: Pat

lenders.name: j p

lenders.loan_because: I believe that  people need  a "hand UP", not just a hand-out" ..And if you give people opportunity, they can use it to change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Our family business takes on people with no previous sales experience, we train them and we also guarantee employment in New motor vehicle sales within 2 weeks.. we work with many franchise Dealerships who (without realising) are all part of helping people change their lives for the better by giving them a fresh start and a new career.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for the life I have and would like to share it.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: Someone asked for help.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I can!  And I would hope someone would do the same for me if I needed it.

lenders.name: Samuel

lenders.occupational_info: I get people interested in our products so that our sales team can sell to them.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I see this as a great opportunity to do some long term good in people's lives.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Together we can make a better world for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm selling space in aircrafts of all airlines.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: good ideas deserve funding

lenders.name: ron
lenders.loan_because: To help people that would like to see there dreams come true.

lenders.name: Maciek
lenders.loan_because:
A while ago I won 300 euro in lotto, well,... that will be one year now. Since then I have been thinking of what to do with this money,... invest it in something, spend on more lotto tickets, treat myself to something nice,... etc. Nothing really appealed to me.
Finally I've decided to help someone else with it - I got a bit of luck, why not pass it on.... so here I am on Kiva :-)
lenders.occupational_info: Working in Telecommunication. Will write more soon.

lenders.name: Nathan&Heidi
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we wish to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student.

lenders.name: Dustin
lenders.loan_because: It helps those in need to help themselves. Dignity and purpose are key elements in a vibrant economy. Africa has for too long been subjugated by the larger economic forces of the world. This is a tool to undermine an institutionalized world economic disparity. It is by empowering the individual that we build sustainable vibrant civilizations. That the borrower is a woman adds even greater impact to the socio-economic contribution. I wish her all the luck and good wishes from my heart and soul! She is already a success, and I am certain she will continue down that path.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an independant programmer that designs and builds websites and computer software much like the one that is allowing us to be in contact with each other.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: Great way to learn about the world
lenders.occupational_info: I find out how to train and educate people the best

lenders.name: Francine
lenders.loan_because: like to help

lenders.name: Rutger
lenders.loan_because: to help somebody starting his own company, because they also have a right for a good  future
lenders.occupational_info: I educate children with aggression problems.

lenders.name: Mike and Nancy
lenders.loan_because: We believe in passing along the power of a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach university courses on-line.  Not everyone has the luxury of being near a school, or having the time available regularly to attend classes.  Online education fills that need for many people.

lenders.name: Kralingen
lenders.loan_because: Seen enough by traveling nearly monthly for over 46 years!
lenders.occupational_info: More people should invest through KIVA instead of giving donation to well known nat./int. companies with employees with high salaries and business class flights.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because:
I have therefore I give!  
Also, I previously set up a small business and was fortunate enough to have access to the capital (and a friendly bank manager!) to be able to do this easily.  It's great to give others for whom life is more difficult the same opportunity.

lenders.name: Dare
lenders.loan_because: Poverty and economic unequality also need to be fought on an individual level.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a tech support team in a university.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help these people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people improve creativity, lateral thinking and innovation.

lenders.name: Warwick
lenders.whereabouts: West Pennant Hills New South Wales
lenders.loan_because:
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has. (Mead)

I'm just getting going.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: There are many of us who, like me, have dreams, but are unable to fulfil them. Often this is as a consequence of domestic circumstances or because of politics and wars, or, more often than not, because of a lack of money. I live in a country where my own dreams materialise very easily due to a greater opportunity to make things work. Now, thanks to KIVA.org I can now help make others' dreams become a reality where individuals do not have such luck as I.
lenders.occupational_info: British-born, I now live in Spain.

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.occupation: merchant in wholesale and foreign trade
lenders.loan_because: The world lives by new opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize the office.

lenders.name: Frank & Gaurav
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those who want to help themselves.  This is an excellent way to end, or drastically reduce poverty. Our picture was taken at Chich'en Itza in Mexico.
lenders.occupational_info:
Frank - Bean Counter and Entrepreneur 
Gaurav - Scope Monkey

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I want to help people accomplish their goal of creating a stable financial future for themselves and their children. If that can be accomplished by loaning them the money to start or maintain their businesses then it is a small price to pay to assist their financial needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher that works with adolesences who have difficulty reading and writing. They are labeled as having a specific learning disability. Their disability subtype (what there actual disability is) would be called dyslexia. They are very normal kids who struggle learning to read and write. My husband is a carpenter who owns his own business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: As a former Peace Corps Volunteer I worked with small business owners development business plans to secure small loans.  I understand how one small loan can change someone's world and help their family to live a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an agriculture development NGO in Minnesota.  We work with the US Government to implement agricultural & livestock development projects around the world.

lenders.name: Bardia + Constanza
lenders.loan_because: Our favorite part is that this website enables to help people directly and we get to know their names, faces and circumstances. Kiva is a great concept which hopefully can really make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Both living in Amsterdam

lenders.name: Anonymous
lenders.loan_because: It is our duty to care for one another.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I feel that even a small donation will actually make a big difference. The money goes directly to a specific use. I love this idea.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I hate to see person's dignity degraded.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to make large computer systems run really fast.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Natalee
lenders.loan_because: The action required to sustain human life is primarily intellectual: Everything man needs has to be discovered by his mind and produced by his effort.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I have been an independent business owner for over 16 years and have many times wished that I could expand and also pursue other business opportunities. Because of this I know what it is like and want to help and share this with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Whether a business needs a logo, an ad or packaging for a product I create the art to help  sell their businesses or products.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: The amount of $25 is almost nothing here, but there it can change a lot!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working in an office

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.occupation: Amall Business Owner - Phoenix Art Supplies

lenders.name: Irene
lenders.loan_because:
"Friend of the Earth." That is what Kodjo Ameya's friends in Togo say that he is. I love his picture. He is sitting on a huge pile of a crop he has gathered.

I heard about Kiva through an article in Mother Earth News and thought it was such a great idea.  It makes me feel like a real philanthropist, just like Bill Gates!  I find that it has also been a real education to look through all the pictures and loan explanations.

I seem to be drawn to the farmers. My father was a landscape architect, his father was a surveyor and logger, and my other grandfather was a farm boy. I grew up in a country town surrounded by orchards and dairy farms.

These are the reasons why I would also like to be thought of as a Friend of the Earth. It is what I want to be.

lenders.name: Matt Landry
lenders.loan_because: All people need is a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I implement software systems for large businesses.

lenders.name: amilawstudent

lenders.occupational_info: I read. I learn. I absorb. I search for Logic. I write.

lenders.name: Lyn
lenders.loan_because: When I needed help, I was lucky enough to have friends and strangers there for me. I wish to do the same for some not so fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist by choice and an Educational Writer by need. My passion is in my art. I melt glass and create lovely beads that reflect the beauty I see around me.
